title: Hay Swahili People - explain course concepts

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe an aspect of Bantu or Swahili society that is not included in the source.Describe one way societies such as the ones described in the source challenge misconceptions about early Africa. Formulate a claim about how political factors contributed to the fall of the city-states on the Swahili Coast.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe an aspect of Bantu or Swahili society that is not included in the source.Describe one way societies such as the ones described in the source challenge misconceptions about early Africa. Formulate a claim about how political factors contributed to the fall of the city-states on the Swahili Coast.

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
